ISSUE.TITLE: Display flag image on admin languages screen
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: I would like to display the language flag image inline on the languages screen. It will help catch languages without a flag image defined, and languages where the wrong image is defined, without having to edit each language one at a time. The screen I am talking about is: ![languagescreen](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/740393/13405136/045c40b2-deeb-11e5-94bd-90db6da4e2f8.PNG) And I believe it is valuable because a language without a flag image define will result in broken icons in other screens. ![brokenimage](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/740393/13405162/1fca5366-deeb-11e5-8683-2de5b9139260.PNG) I guess a secondary issue would maybe be to not display a broken image when no flag image is actually defined.
